Events.name: Pahal
Events.content: This is a Event in ehich the locals are given information about meritious goverment schemes for their upliftment.
Events.round1: Team Vibhav successfully organized PAHAL, an impactful awareness campaign, on March 15 in Barot village. Our mission was not just to inform people about government schemes but to inspire and empower them by highlighting opportunities that could enhance their livelihoods. By reaching out directly to the community, we aimed to educate skilled and unskilled workers about the initiatives designed for their upliftment and growth.
Events.round2: As part of this initiative, we focused on spreading awareness about the PM Vishwakarma Yojana, a scheme introduced to support artisans and traditional craftsmen. The scheme provides financial assistance, modern toolkits, and skill development training, ensuring that workers can enhance their craftsmanship and sustain their livelihoods. The Himachal Pradesh government has played a key role in launching such initiatives to foster economic development and self-reliance among the workforce, and through PAHAL, we sought to bridge the gap between government policies and public awareness.
Events.round3: Through PAHAL, Team Vibhav not only educated the local community about the PM Vishwakarma Yojana but also engaged with them to understand their challenges and aspirations. Many skilled workers, including carpenters, blacksmiths, and artisans, were unaware of the financial aid and training opportunities available to them. By providing clear insights into the benefits of the scheme, we encouraged them to utilize these resources to enhance their craftsmanship and economic stability.
Events.round4: The campaign also highlighted the role of technology and government policies in transforming rural livelihoods. We interacted with local workers and demonstrated how access to modern tools, financial support, and skill development programs could significantly improve their productivity and earning potential. Our team ensured that the information was delivered in a simple and relatable manner, making it easier for people to grasp the essence of the scheme and its long-term benefits.
Events.round5: Apart from spreading awareness, PAHAL also fostered meaningful conversations and connections between the villagers and our team. The positive response from the community reinforced our belief that small initiatives can lead to significant changes. Many individuals expressed their willingness to explore the benefits of the scheme, and we provided guidance on how to apply for assistance and access resources. This engagement was a testament to the importance of on-ground awareness programs in making government initiatives truly effective.
Events.round6: Overall, PAHAL was a remarkable step towards community development, reinforcing the idea that awareness is the first step toward empowerment. The enthusiasm and participation of the villagers reflected their eagerness to embrace new opportunities. Team Vibhav remains committed to organizing such initiatives in the future, striving to bridge the gap between policy implementation and public awareness, ensuring that every individual can benefit from government efforts aimed at progress and prosperity.

Events.name: Prerak
Events.content: Reflecting on a day full of inspiration and learning at Government Boys School, Hamirpur.
Events.round1: It was a day filled with inspiration and learning as Team Vibhav witnessed young minds light up with curiosity while exploring the wonders of engineering and technology. The enthusiasm and eagerness shown by the students made the experience truly rewarding. Through PRERAK, we aimed to spark interest, creativity, and confidence among students, encouraging them to dream beyond boundaries and explore the limitless possibilities of technology.
Events.round2: On February 11th, Team Vibhav had the privilege of interacting with students of Government Boys School, Hamirpur. The session was designed to introduce students to the fundamentals of engineering and technology in a simple, engaging, and relatable manner. By connecting classroom concepts with real-world applications, we helped students understand how engineering plays a vital role in everyday life.
Events.round3: Interactive discussions and engaging demonstrations formed the heart of the event. Students actively participated, asked thoughtful questions, and showed great curiosity about various technical domains. The hands-on approach not only enhanced their understanding but also instilled confidence and excitement about learning new concepts, making the experience both educational and enjoyable.
Events.round4: Overall, PRERAK proved to be a meaningful and impactful initiative for Team Vibhav. By guiding and motivating young students, we took another step toward empowering the next generation of innovators and problem-solvers. The event reaffirmed our belief that consistent guidance and encouragement can shape bright futures—one inspired mind at a time.

Events.name: Clean the Peaks
Events.content: An environmental awareness and cleanliness drive aimed at preserving the natural beauty of the Himalayan region.
Events.round1: Clean the Peaks was organized by Team Vibhav with the objective of promoting environmental responsibility and cleanliness in mountainous regions. The event focused on spreading awareness about the impact of littering on fragile ecosystems and the importance of sustainable practices.
Events.round2: Volunteers actively participated in cleaning drives at selected locations, collecting plastic waste and other non-biodegradable materials. Alongside the cleanup activity, participants engaged in discussions about waste management and the long-term consequences of environmental neglect.
Events.round3: The event also emphasized community involvement by encouraging locals and visitors to adopt eco-friendly habits. By interacting with people on-site, the team highlighted simple actions that can collectively make a significant difference in protecting nature.
Events.round4: Clean the Peaks successfully reinforced the idea that environmental conservation is a shared responsibility. The initiative served as a reminder that preserving natural landscapes requires continuous effort, awareness, and commitment from individuals and communities alike.

Events.name: Vanpravartak
Events.content: Vanpravartak is an awareness-driven initiative focused on promoting forest conservation, environmental responsibility, and sustainable practices among local communities.
Events.round1: Team Vibhav successfully organized VANPRAVARTAK, an impactful environmental awareness campaign, aimed at educating local communities about the importance of forest conservation and sustainable living. The initiative was conducted with the objective of fostering a sense of responsibility towards nature and encouraging people to actively participate in protecting forest resources that are vital for ecological balance and rural livelihoods.
Events.round2: As part of this campaign, we focused on spreading awareness about government-led afforestation programs, forest protection schemes, and sustainable resource management practices. The initiative highlighted how responsible use of forest resources, plantation drives, and conservation efforts can help combat climate change, prevent soil erosion, and ensure long-term environmental sustainability. Through VANPRAVARTAK, we aimed to bridge the gap between environmental policies and public participation.
Events.round3: The campaign also emphasized the role of technology, awareness, and government initiatives in promoting sustainable forestry and environmental conservation. We demonstrated how simple practices such as plantation, waste reduction, and mindful consumption can significantly contribute to protecting ecosystems. The information was delivered in a simple and relatable manner, ensuring that people could easily understand the importance of conservation and their role in it.
Events.round4: Overall, VANPRAVARTAK stood as a significant step toward environmental consciousness and sustainable development. The campaign reinforced the idea that protecting forests is not just a responsibility but a necessity for future generations. Team Vibhav remains committed to organizing such initiatives, striving to promote harmony between development and nature, and ensuring a greener and more sustainable future for all.

Workshops.name: Cloud Computing
Workshops.content: This workshop offers practical training and insights into utilizing remote servers to store, manage, and process data and applications over the internet.
Workshops.round1: Embark on a transformative journey into the world of cloud computing with our upcoming workshop. Whether you're a beginner eager to explore the fundamentals or a seasoned professional looking to enhance your expertise, this workshop is tailored to equip you with the essential knowledge and hands-on experience needed to navigate the ever-evolving cloud landscape. Cloud computing is revolutionizing industries, and mastering it is crucial for staying ahead in the tech-driven world.
Workshops.round2: In addition to theoretical knowledge, the workshop will feature hands-on exercises and interactive sessions designed to demystify the workings of leading cloud service providers such as Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Participants will have the opportunity to deploy applications, configure cloud environments, and explore various cloud-based solutions, gaining practical experience that is highly sought after in the industry.
Workshops.round3: Beyond technical skills, the workshop will delve into cloud security, cost optimization, and best practices for effectively managing cloud resources. Whether you're interested in building cloud-native applications, understanding DevOps in the cloud, or exploring AI and machine learning integrations, this session will provide you with a strong foundation and hands-on exposure to cutting-edge cloud technologies.
Workshops.round4: This workshop is not just about learning—it’s about collaboration and networking. Participants will engage in group discussions, real-world case studies, and problem-solving exercises, fostering a community of cloud enthusiasts who can exchange ideas, troubleshoot challenges, and explore career opportunities in cloud computing. With cloud adoption accelerating across industries, acquiring cloud skills will open new doors in fields such as software development, cybersecurity, and IT infrastructure management.

Workshops.name: System on Chip
Workshops.content: This workshop provides hands-on learning and expertise in developing integrated circuits that incorporate all necessary components of electronic system onto a single chip.
Workshops.round1: Ready to dive deep into the revolutionary world of System on Chip (SoC) technology? Join us for an electrifying workshop where we explore the architecture, functionality, and real-world applications of SoC. This cutting-edge technology integrates multiple components, such as processors, memory, input/output interfaces, and more, onto a single chip, making it a game-changer in modern electronics. From smartphones and IoT devices to automotive systems and AI accelerators, SoC is at the heart of today’s most advanced innovations.
Workshops.round2: Whether you're an aspiring engineer, a seasoned developer, or a tech enthusiast hungry for knowledge, this workshop promises to fuel your curiosity and enhance your expertise. We will break down the fundamentals of SoC architecture, including processor cores, communication buses, power management, and hardware-software co-design. Understanding these concepts is essential for anyone looking to delve into embedded systems, VLSI design, or chip-level programming.
Workshops.round3: Beyond theory, the workshop will feature interactive hands-on sessions, allowing participants to work with SoC development boards and simulation tools. You will gain practical experience in designing, programming, and optimizing SoC-based systems, making this workshop an excellent platform to bridge the gap between academia and industry requirements. Whether you are working with FPGA-based SoC designs or ARM-based architectures, this session will provide valuable insights into real-world implementations.
Workshops.round4: Apart from gaining technical skills, this workshop offers a fantastic opportunity to connect with industry experts, professors, and fellow tech enthusiasts who share a passion for semiconductor technology and embedded systems. Engage in thought-provoking discussions, brainstorming sessions, and networking opportunities, paving the way for future collaborations and innovations in chip design.

Workshops.name: PCB Design
Workshops.content: This workshop provides hands-on experience in designing, simulating, and fabricating Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs) used in real-world electronic systems.
Workshops.round1: The PCB Design workshop was organized to introduce participants to the fundamentals of printed circuit boards and their importance in modern electronic systems. From consumer electronics to industrial automation, PCBs form the backbone of almost every electronic device, making this skill essential for electronics enthusiasts and aspiring engineers.
Workshops.round2: Participants were guided through the complete PCB design workflow, including schematic design, component selection, footprint creation, and layout routing using industry-standard tools. The session emphasized best practices such as signal integrity, power management, and component placement to ensure reliable and efficient designs.
Workshops.round3: Hands-on demonstrations allowed students to design their own PCB layouts, perform design rule checks (DRC), and generate fabrication files such as Gerber and BOM files. This practical exposure helped bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and real-world hardware implementation.
Workshops.round4: The workshop also covered PCB fabrication and assembly processes, giving participants insights into manufacturing techniques, soldering methods, and common design mistakes to avoid. By the end of the session, attendees gained the confidence to design and prototype their own PCBs for academic projects, startups, and personal innovations.

GuestLectures.name: Exploring the Potential of MEMS Technology
GuestLectures.speaker: Dr.Gargi Khanna, Associate Professor,NIT Hamirpur
GuestLectures.content: A technical guest lecture focused on Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems (MEMS), their design, applications, and impact on modern electronics.
GuestLectures.round1: The session introduced the fundamentals of MEMS technology, including microfabrication techniques, sensors, actuators, and their integration with electronic systems.
GuestLectures.round2: Real-world applications of MEMS in smartphones, automotive systems, biomedical devices, and IoT were discussed, along with insights into research opportunities and future industry trends.

GuestLectures.name: How Large Language Models (LLMs) Work
GuestLectures.speaker: Srishti Gureja
GuestLectures.content: An informative guest lecture explaining the fundamentals of Large Language Models, their working principles, and real-world applications.
GuestLectures.round1: The lecture covered the core concepts behind Large Language Models, including neural networks, transformers, training data, and model architectures that enable machines to understand and generate human-like text.
GuestLectures.round2: Students explored practical applications of LLMs in areas such as chatbots, content generation, coding assistance, and research, along with discussions on ethical considerations and future advancements.

GuestLectures.name: Aavardhan
GuestLectures.speaker: Dr. Puran Singh, Associate Professor,IIT Mandi
GuestLectures.content: Anytime is a Good time to start a Company. Driven by passion and perseverance, startups have the power to disrupt industries and shape the future.
GuestLectures.round1: Team Vibhav, in collaboration with the Incubation Centre, NIT Hamirpur, under the CM Startup Project of Himachal Pradesh, proudly presents आवर्धनः – From Spark to Unicorn Brilliance. This dynamic guest lecture is designed to inspire and educate aspiring entrepreneurs and innovators, providing them with valuable insights into the world of startups, business growth, and technological advancements. आवर्धनः aims to bridge the gap between ideas and execution, encouraging young minds to turn their visions into successful ventures.
GuestLectures.round2: We are honored to welcome Dr. Puran Singh, Associate Professor at IIT Mandi and Director of the Incubation Centre, IIT Mandi, as our esteemed guest lecturer. With extensive experience and expertise in entrepreneurship, innovation, and startup ecosystems, he has guided countless individuals in transforming their business ideas into thriving enterprises. His insights into business incubation, funding strategies, and scaling startups will provide invaluable knowledge to all participants.
GuestLectures.round3: Beyond theoretical knowledge, Dr. Puran Singh will share real-life experiences and success stories, highlighting the essential skills, mindset, and resources required to navigate the competitive landscape of entrepreneurship. Attendees will gain clarity on crucial aspects such as business model development, investor pitching, market strategies, and technology-driven innovation, ensuring that they are well-equipped to embark on their own entrepreneurial journeys.
GuestLectures.round4: The event is not just about learning—it’s about networking and fostering a community of like-minded individuals who are passionate about innovation and business development. Participants will have the chance to connect with mentors, industry experts, and fellow aspiring entrepreneurs, opening doors to potential collaborations, mentorship opportunities, and future ventures. The session will serve as a launchpad for students looking to engage with startup incubators, accelerators, and investment programs.
